name: Sustainable Happiness Together
what_you_do: Sustainable Happiness Together is a team of emotional regulation experts who support clients to live their best lives through resilience, mindfulness, and happiness.
who_you_serve: Sustainable Happiness Together supports people to be resilient and thrive.
social_proof: Liz Rutledge is trained by Mindful Schools. Dr. Cyrina Bullard is an Amazon best-selling author, certified by UC Berkeley in the Science of Happiness, by Yale in the Science of Well-Being, and certified in Conversational Intelligence®.
signature_programs: Resilience, Mindfulness, Happiness, Designing Your Life
business_focus: Sustainable Happiness Together supports people to be resilient and thrive by inspiring them to be more present, experience more mindfulness and happiness, while powerfully living into the vision of their optimal life.
service_provided: Mindfulness education, emotional regulation coaching, sustainability education
